examples.example: 生活是公平的，只要我们努力付出，就一定会有所收获。

translate.english: Life is fair, as long as we work hard and pay, there will definitely be gains.

examples.example: 这个世界是公平的，只要我们保持积极向上的心态，努力奋斗，就一定能实现自己的梦想。

translate.english: The world is fair. As long as we keep a positive and upward mindset and strive hard, we will definitely be able to realize our dreams.

examples.example: 老师总是公平地对待每一位学生，不会有任何偏袒。

translate.english: Teachers always treat every student fairly and there will be no favoritism.
